sherlock.commonutils (subpackage) ∞

common tools used throughout package

Subpackage Members

get_crossmatch_catalogues_column_map(dbConn, log) Query the sherlock-catalogues helper tables to generate a map of the important columns of each catalogue
getpackagepath Get common file and folder paths for the host package - used in unit testing code
update_wiki_pages(log[, settings]) Update sherlock’s github wiki pages with some useful info regarding the crossmatch database catalogue tables
